channel.title: Oh No! Xp going to die
channel.description:
I obviously know this is the wrong section but I just turned the computer on and went to yahoo. I found this in the process
http://tech.yahoo.com/blogs/null/25252
Windows XP is going to removed from stores just like linux did. So if you are planning on getting Xp or not wanting to go to Vista, I'd plan on getting the software before the end of june. More than 80% of us use xp and now it is being taken away :(. Even though we'd be able to find xp or use someone elses copy of xp. No new updates for xp ftl.

item.title: Oh No! Xp going to die
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

codeusa:

Yay now my xp disk will sell big on ebay

Not really >.>…Alot of people have xp so if you have a copy of it, you can put it on your other comp etc. Goodboi, xp will still work o.O just means that it won’t be updated, won’t be in stores, and microsoft will stick with vista or a new project

PeeHPee never heard of it :]
EDIT: nevermind PeeHPee, it is linux based, linux is already out of stores too :]…They said that like a month ago I think

Read full topic
item.source: Oh No! Xp going to die

item.title: Oh No! Xp going to die
item.dc:creator: @PeeHPee PeeHPee
item.description:
@PeeHPee wrote:

XP fucking fails.
EDIT: If you’re going to reply saying Vista fails, I don’t use Vista.
EDIT2: If you’re going to ask me what I use, I use Ubuntu.

Read full topic
